title: Remove FAQ page and all FAQ navigation links

requirements.text: Remove the FAQ page from the frontend by deleting the /faq route and removing the FAQPage import/usage so the application no longer registers or serves a FAQ page.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/App.tsx route tree no longer defines a route for path "/faq"
The app builds successfully with no unused/failed imports related to FAQPage

requirements.text: Remove all navigation references to the FAQ page from the UI, including the Footer FAQ link and the Support page link to /faq.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx no longer renders a link to "/faq"
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx no longer renders a link to "/faq"
No other visible navigation element links to "/faq"

requirements.text: Ensure that directly visiting the URL path "/faq" no longer displays FAQ content; instead, the user should see a not-found experience or be redirected to the home page.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting "/faq" does not render the previous FAQ accordion content
The user is either redirected to "/" or shown a not-found page with a clear path back to Home

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only Shadcn components).
Do not change backend canister interfaces or storage as part of removing the FAQ.
nonGoals: Do not add a replacement FAQ page or any new informational page content.
Do not rewrite Terms, Privacy, Policy, Pricing, or Support page copy beyond removing FAQ references.
